	<item>
		<title>5 Exercises You Can Do Without Getting Out of Bed</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/5-exercises-can-without-getting-bed/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 24 Oct 2016 15:25:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=168</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="wp-image-170 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/be1.jpg" alt="be1" width="603" height="903" />

Don't want to get up extra early to log a morning workout at the gym? Fine, stay in bed. You can still transform your body with exercises you can do right on your mattress. Choose a few of them, or complete every move, and perform as many reps as you can in 30 seconds. You'll burn more calories than you would by repeatedly hitting the snooze button.

<img class="size-full wp-image-174 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Marching-Hip-Raise.jpg" alt="marching-hip-raise" width="300" height="300" />

&nbsp;

<strong>1. Marching Hip Raises:</strong> Lie on your back with your knees bent, heels near your butt, and arms along your sides with palms facing down. Press into your heels as you lift your hips up so your body forms a line between your knees and shoulders. Without extending your leg, squeeze your butt as you lift your right foot up off the bed and bring your right knee directly over your right hip. Place your right foot back on the bed and repeat on the left side. That's one rep. Continue to alternate.

Where you'll feel it: Your butt, abs, and thighs.<!--nextpage-->

<img class=" wp-image-175 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Side-Plank-With-Twist.jpg" alt="side-plank-with-twist" width="479" height="480" />
<strong>2. Side Plank With Twist:</strong> Lie on your right side and place your right forearm on the bed. Keeping your hips, shoulders, and feet stacked, brace your core as you lift your hips up toward the ceiling as high as you can. Stretch your left arm straight up toward the ceiling. Without touching the bed, slowly lower your hips, then return to starting position. Keeping your core tight, twist from the waist as you bring your left arm down and underneath your body. Return to starting position to complete one rep. Continue for 30 seconds, then repeat on the opposite side. (To make this move slightly easier, stagger your feet or place your top foot on the bed in front of you.)

Where you'll feel it: Your abs, obliques, and triceps.

<img class=" wp-image-173 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Leg-Lift-With-Knee.jpeg" alt="leg-lift-with-knee" width="326" height="326" />
<strong>3. Leg Lift With Knee In:</strong> Lie on your right side with your right knee bent and foot behind you. Prop your head up with your right hand and place your left hand on your left hip. Point your left toes and extend your left leg to form a straight line with your body. Keeping your hips stacked, lift your left leg straight up toward the ceiling, then bend the knee and bring it in toward your core. Extend the leg back up toward the ceiling, then lower it with control to return to starting position. That's one rep. Continue for 30 seconds, then repeat on the opposite side.

Where you'll feel it: Your abs, butt, and outer thighs.

<img class=" wp-image-171 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Diamond-Reverse-Crunches.jpg" alt="diamond-reverse-crunches" width="357" height="422" />
<strong>4. Diamond Reverse Crunches:</strong> Lie on your back with your arms along your sides, palms facing down. Bring your feet together and open your knees out to the sides so the space between your legs resembles a diamond. Press into your palms and brace your core as you raise your feet up over your hips. From this position, lift your hips up off the bed to drive your feet straight up toward the ceiling. With control, bring your hips back to the bed. (Don't drop your feet.) That's one rep.

Where you'll feel it: Your lower abs and thighs.<!--nextpage-->

<img class="size-full wp-image-172 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Jack-Splits.jpg" alt="jack-splits" width="500" height="405" />
<strong>5. Jack Splits:</strong> Lie on your back on the bed with your thumbs interlocked, arms and legs outstretched, and feet together. Brace your core as you lift your arms and feet off the bed, keeping knees and elbows locked. Exhale as you lift your legs up and out to form a V, and lift your entire upper body off the bed. As you come up, swing your hands straight forward through the V. With control and without touching the bed, release your arms and legs, and lower back to starting position. That's one rep.
Where you'll feel it: Your upper and lower abs, chest, and quads.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

More: <a href="http://www.cosmopolitan.com/">cosmopolitan</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Seven Fips to Fet Fid of Frizzy Hair</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/seven-fips-fet-fid-frizzy-hair/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 25 Oct 2016 17:44:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=180</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Frizz is caused by changes in humidity levels, which makes each hair strand expand and reshape (and, unsurprisingly, extreme weather, central heating and air conditioning can play a key role). To keep frizz levels under control, hydration is essential;

<img class=" wp-image-182 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/sxxzv.jpg" alt="sxxzv" width="632" height="947" />

<!--nextpage-->

<strong>1.Protect Against Heat</strong>
Before you even think about going near your hair with a flatiron or blow-dryer, spritz on a heat-protective spray. This is important for all hair types, but especially for those with fine hair, which is more prone to the kind of cuticle damage that leads to frizz.

&nbsp;

<strong>2.Don’t blow dry for too long</strong>

Blow drying your hair for too long will dry out the natural oils in your hair and cause the strands of hair to actually shrink, so keep drying time to a minimum. Also, try using a cool setting on your hairdryer, it will be less damaging for your locks and it will help get rid of frizzy hair too.

<strong>3</strong>.<strong> Twice a week,</strong> only use conditioner on your hair instead of shampooing it. You might think your hair needs to be shampooed several times a week, but it doesn't. Every two days, apply conditioner instead of shampoo and then rinse it out. Conditioner contains a small amount of surfactants (what shampoo uses to cleanse your hair), so it will clean it without stripping your hair of its natural oils. Garrison suggests using a lightweight conditioner if you have fine hair, like Nexxus Hydra-Light Weightless Moisture Conditioner. If you have thick and coarse hair, you can use a rich formula, like Wen by Chaz Dean Fig Cleansing Conditioner.

<strong>4. Use a hydrating mask once a week.</strong> Doing a special treatment at least once a week, especially in colder months when the air is dry, will help fill any holes in your hair shaft that soak up outside moisture and contribute to frizz. Leonor Greyl Masque à L'Orchidée contains glycerin, strengthening silk proteins, and smoothing vegetal ceramides to fight frizz.

5.<strong>Get rid of any hair products that contain alcohol</strong>
Too much alcohol can leave your hair with a nasty hangover in the form of frizz. The biggest boozy culprit: hair spray, the alcohol content of which can swell up the hair cuticle, causing puffiness.<!--nextpage-->

6. <strong>Deep conditioning treatments</strong>

Since we, girls, adore using various heating gadgets and we love doing it often, our hair gets damaged, hence the frizz. To revitalize dehydrated dry hair make weekly deep conditioning treatments or use leave-in conditioners.

7. <strong>Use silicon-based hair products</strong>

Not only silicon based hair products will help get rid of frizzy hair, but also these products will add wonderful shine to otherwise dry and dull looking locks.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>7 Ways to maximize your workout</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/7-ways-maximize-workout/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 Oct 2016 16:30:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=187</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Exercise isn’t an exact science—think different strokes for different folks. But one fact rings true: Something is better than nothing. A healthy exercise habit should blend fun and fitness, effort with results. . Instead of dreading the gym, learn to streamline the process using these healthy exercise habits to get more out a workout than ever before.

<img class=" wp-image-191 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/dsa.jpg" alt="7-Ways" width="396" height="655" />

That’s where these 7 tips come in.
<h3>1. Create a game plan</h3>
“Most people who go to the gym flounder around, thinking about what to do next,” says Brad Schoenfeld, author of 28 Day Body Shapeover. “This is inefficient and reduces the quality of a workout.” He suggests writing down your exercises and times before going to the gym (and taking your schedule with you!). This will eliminate decision-making at the gym and streamline your workout.<!--nextpage-->
<h3>2. Stay on schedule.</h3>
Habits don’t just happen, they’re formed. Figure out when there’s time for exercise—first thing in the morning, at lunch, or after work. But don’t stress; there is no right time to work out. Consistency is the real game-changer. Prioritize exercise, and form a healthy habit by sticking to the schedule every day
<h3>3. Do your warm-up on the way to the gym</h3>
Rather than driving to the gym, walk, jog, or bike! This allows you to cut down on your gym time while still giving you a proper warm up before your workout. If you live too far and you have to drive or bus, park a couple blocks away or get off a few stops before the gym

&nbsp;
<h3>4.Shift your attention</h3>
Shift your attention inward and take notice of how your body is doing, how you are feeling. Not only will you get a better workout and understand how your body is moving, you will also reduce the risk of injuries as you keep your mind from becoming distracted by all that is life outside your workout.<!--nextpage-->
<h3>5. Consult your “library”</h3>
Even if you have your workout mapped out, Workman suggests a back-up plan. “A ‘library’ of exercises will give you something to do if the equipment you need is occupied,” she says. How to build your library? Research online, memorize moves from a group fitness class, or scrutinize fitness books or magazines. (Start with our guides to squats and push-ups and our collection of arm exercises.
<h3>6.Music</h3>
I truly don’t know how people can workout without music, but props to you if you’re one of those people! I NEED music blaring in my headphones to keep me motivated, to give me an extra push, and to dance around or stretch to in between my sets and rests. If you’re looking for inspirational and motivational tunes, check out my monthly music playlists here.
<h3>7. Multi joint moves</h3>
Unlike single joint moves such as leg extensions and bicep curls, multi joint moves like squats, lunges and rows involve a large group of muscles, so they are the most effective and really improve your workouts. You can even combine two movements into one. Try wall ball squats with biceps curls, for instance. This maximizes energy expenditure, which leads to higher calorie burn.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>187</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2016-10-26 16:30:33]]></wp:post_date>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[7-ways-maximize-workout]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="fitness"><![CDATA[fitness]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="health"><![CDATA[health]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="running"><![CDATA[Running]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="uncategorized"><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[188]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[mvp_featured_image]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[show]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[mvp_post_template]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_content_score]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[90]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_focuskeywords]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[]]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_primary_category]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Six Fitness Tips To Boost Your Stamina</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/boost-your-stamina/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 30 Oct 2016 05:49:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=202</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">One of the real assets of an athlete or a player is not their perfect physique but their stamina. Stamina not only means having strength and energy to endure an activity for an extended period but also helps fight illness and stressful situations. Want to increase your stamina? Then, Try these stamina-boosting tips.</span>

<!--nextpage-->
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">1. BREATHE RIGHT.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">When it comes to exercise, the art of inhaling and exhaling may be a little more complicated and a little more important than we actually think it is. You have to breathe right in order to make every type of workout easier.</span><!--nextpage-->
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">2. SHORTER RESTS.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">When it comes to strength training, we have to think about the rest between the sets too. I actually find myself resting far more than I need, because I just forgot to start sooner.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">In order to improve your stamina, you should pay more attention to the rests between the sets, and between the workouts and of course make them as short as possible. So, limit your recovery time between sets to 30 to 60 seconds, and you’ll build the stamina.</span><!--nextpage-->
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">3: Start slowly</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">If you have just begun your stamina boosting routine then, take baby steps rather than push yourself into a hectic and rigorous programme. If you wish to run a desired distance in a required amount of time, then start with walking or by running, shorter distances until your body builds up enough stamina.</span><!--nextpage-->
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">4. TRY DIFFERENT KINDS OF CARDIO</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Don’t stick with only one type of cardio. It’s okay to work on the elliptical machine sometimes, but not every single training. So in order to improve your stamina, you should try different kinds of cardio.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">For example, elliptical cardio workout on Mondays, running on Tuesdays, cycling on Wednesdays, fast walking on Thursdays, and skipping rope on Fridays. Every single cardio workout has different kind of benefits, so why not mix it a bit, make it more fun, and improve the stamina in the same time?<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">5. DON’T FORGET THE DURATION</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">When doing cardiovascular activities, the thing that matters the most is the frequency and the intensity. But there’s one more thing that we actually all forget and it matters a lot, and that is the duration. Think about the duration of the workout, because it is really important when it comes to building the stamina.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">So make sure your cardio workout lasts at least 25-30 minutes when you do it after the strength training workout, and at least 40 minutes if you have cardio day. Make it last longer, and you’ll see the results really fast.</span>

<!--nextpage-->
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">3. DO CARDIO RIGHT AFTER YOUR STRENGTH TRAINING</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">The thing is, the more muscle you can get working, the more it will challenge your heart and your cardiovascular system. So according to this, and many other reasons, you should try incorporating your cardio in the strength training days, right after the weight lifting session.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Instead of making cardio only days, try mixing it all in one training and improve the stamina, by maximizing the calorie burn in the same time.</span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>202</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2016-10-30 05:49:12]]></wp:post_date>

		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

	<item>
		<title>6 HOME REMEDIES FOR INGROWN HAIR</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/6-home-remedies-ingrown-hair/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 01 Nov 2016 16:36:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=207</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Ingrown hairs are common among men right after shaving, and these are usually found on the cheeks, neck and chin. On the other hand, women may notice small bumps on their armpits, legs and pubic area after waxing or shaving.If you are tired of the pain and embarrassment that an ingrown hair can cause, then you may want to get rid of it by applying certain techniques. When treating and removing ingrown hair, you need to address any inflammation in the affected area until the hair is safe to be pulled out completely. Avoid plucking it unless your skin is no longer inflamed, so you can prevent scarring of the area once you pick the hair out.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-228 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/23112.jpg" alt="23112" width="438" height="639" />So, to avoid these problems, it may help to apply these tips on proper and safe ingrown hair removal naturally.</span>

<!--nextpage-->
<h3></h3>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">1. Baking Soda</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Due to its anti-inflammatory properties and soothing effects, baking soda is a good option to prevent ingrown hair. It helps reduce itching and redness and acts as a natural exfoliator. Make a concentrated solution of baking soda and water and apply it over the affected area with the help of a cotton ball. Leave it for 5-10 minutes and then wash it off with lukewarm water. Repeat this daily for at least a week to get the desired results.<img class=" wp-image-210 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/baking-soda-480x373.jpg" alt="baking-soda-480x373" width="359" height="279" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Alternatively, you can also make a homemade scrub of ground oatmeal, baking soda, and water.<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3>3. Sugar</h3>
Sugar acts as a natural exfoliator  that helps remove the dead skin cells and brings out the ingrown hair. Mix some white sugar, extra virgin olive oil or jojoba oil and ten drops of tea tree oil and lavender oil. Apply this scrub on the affected area and gently rub in a circular motion for a few minutes. Leave it for 5 minutes. Then wash off with lukewarm water. Apply this remedy once daily.<img class=" wp-image-208 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Sugar.jpg" alt="sugar" width="324" height="214" />

Note: This scrub can be kept in an airtight container in a refrigerator for further use.
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">2. Salt</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Salt works as a great exfoliating agent and at the same time helps increase circulation, promote healing and reduce swelling.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Mix one and one-half teaspoons of table salt in one cup of lukewarm water.</span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Dip a cotton ball in the mixture and gently rub it over the affected skin.</span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Leave it on for a few minutes and then rinse it off with water.</span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Do this twice daily until the ingrown hair clears up.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">
4. Honey</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Personally, I do not like an idea of applying honey to the skin or hair, but when I am in trouble, I am ready to apply anything to feel relief. Honey is sticky and hard to rinse, but it boasts powerful antibacterial properties, preventing and fighting bacteria and reducing swelling and inflammation. Apply honey to the affected area, and rinse it off after 10-15 minutes. Use 2 to 4 times a day.<img class=" wp-image-209 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Honey.jpg" alt="honey" width="410" height="253" /></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">5.Black Tea Bags</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">There are a lot of home remedies but you can try but you have to admit that black tea bags can be very effective. Since Black tea contains tannic acid, you can be sure that you will effectively reduce the redness of the skin. The area where the ingrown hair is will also become less inflamed.</span>
<h4 style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Direction:</span></h4>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Place a black tea bag in a cup of warm water.</span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Take out the black tea bag and place it on the affected skin area.</span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Leave on the tea bag for about 2 – 3 minutes.</span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Do this several times a day until the inflammation subsides.<!--nextpage--></span>

&nbsp;
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="size-full wp-image-211 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/cucumber-slices-e1389349796989.jpg" alt="cucumber-slices-e1389349796989" width="400" height="266" />6. Cucumber</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Cucumber contains a lot of water which helps deal with pain, skin inflammation, irritation, redness and swelling . Refrigerate the cucumber for half an hour and cut it into slices. Put these slices into the affected area. This remedy is very simple and must be done every day till the symptoms of ingrown hair subside.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Alternatively, make cucumber puree and add some milk into it. Refrigerate this mixture and apply it to the affected area with the help of cotton swab. Let it stay for 15 minutes. Finally, wash off with lukewarm water.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="aligncenter" src="http://homeremediesauthority.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Coffee-Powder.jpg" alt="home remedies" width="377" height="232" />7.Coffee Powder</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">You could abuse coffee powder as a scrub. Don’t scrub it hard on your skin as coffee powder can be rough on your skin. Mix coffee powder and also water to make a fine paste. You will have to scrub for 15 minutes for 10 days so that you can consult the ingrown hair reaching the area. If you are a coffee addict after that you will enjoy the fragrance and this will certainly assist you to relax.</span>

&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Courtesy <span style="color: #339966; font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;"><a style="color: #339966;" href="http://www.homeremedyhacks.com">homeremedyhacks</a></span></span>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The 9 Best Reasons to Work Out</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/9-best-reasons-work/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 06 Nov 2016 16:58:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=219</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">You've been told a hundred times that exercise is good for you, and it's true—but it's good for a lot more than just losing weight or building muscle. Here are 10 other benefits you'll see from just a little daily exercise.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">1.Exercise prevents the fat and weak arm syndrome</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Sarcopenia is the inevitable loss of muscle mass as we age. We’re all doomed to lose some muscle mass as we age, but the goal is to keep as much of it as you humanly can, so you can be strong and independent as you get older. The decline starts in our early forties, but the good news is that it’s possible to prevent and reverse much of it with a simple weight training routine.<img class="size-full wp-image-233 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/sdfs.jpg" alt="sdfs" width="334" height="500" /></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">2. You'll Have Better Posture</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Good posture is important, and one of the best ways to fix your posture is to exercise the muscles holding you back. Check out some of the most common posture problems people have, and which muscles you should work out to help fix them. Regularly exercising your abs, back, and other muscles can go a long way into fixing your posture, both sitting and standing<!--nextpage--><img class=" wp-image-231 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/iStock-000049082024-Full.jpg" alt="istock-000049082024-full" width="482" height="253" />.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">3 Exercise reduces stress</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">This is a well-known benefit of exercise, but most people don’t know that it takes about six weeks to come into full effect. So, if you start a running routine, don’t expect to feel the rewards immediately. But after three to six weeks, you should notice a significant decrease in your levels of stress in your daily life. Powerful physiological changes will occur in your brain, and you’ll feel better than ever.<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">4 Exercise prevents cancer</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">A recent study done in Finland showed that jogging is more effective than other leisure activities, such as walking, in preventing cancer.This was after accounting for cigarette smoking, fiber and fat intake, age, and other health related variables. Men who jogged or otherwise exercised intensely for at least thirty minutes a day had a 50% reduction in the risk of dying prematurely from cancer.</span>
<h3><img class=" wp-image-122 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/6026df08_shutterstock_80758018.xxxlarge_2x.jpg" alt="6026df08_shutterstock_80758018-xxxlarge_2x" width="551" height="366" />
<span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">5. You'll Sleep Better</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">If you ever have trouble falling asleep at night, the National Sleep Foundation says at regular exercise can help you sleep better. The best time to work out is in the morning or the afternoon, rather than before bed—if you exercise too closely to bedtime, it can actually have the opposite effect! Luckily, there are other good ways to fill up that pre-bed relaxation time. <!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;"><img class="size-full wp-image-135 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Bicep-Curl-400x400_1.jpg" alt="bicep-curl-400x400_1" width="400" height="400" />6. You'll Have More Energy</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">It may seem counter-intuitive—after all, working out can drain your energy quite a bit—but regular exercise can actually make you feel more energized throughout the day. In fact, one study found that exercising in the middle of the day can leave you feeling more energetic and productive for the rest of the afternoon. You should still try to get in some walking throughout the day, but a midday workout could be a great pick-me-up. </span>
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">7. You'll Get Sick Less Often</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Nobody likes getting sick, and exercise can help. A recent study found that people who exercised regularly were half as likely to get a cold than people who didn't—which is odds I'd gladly take. Taking a good steam afterward can help, too. </span>
<h3>8. You'll Just Be Happier</h3>
All this put together equals a much happier you. It's not just those "runner's high" endorphins—regular exercise can actually improve your life in oh-so-many ways. All you need to do is make it a habit—the University of Bristol found that people's mood significantly improved on days they exercised, so find a way to fit a quick workout into your daily routine and you'll be well on your way.
<h3><span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">9.You’ll Stay Sharp in your Old Age</span></h3>
One unfortunate aspect of the ageing process is a gradual decline in cognitive function, but its been shown that people who engage in regular physical activity experience this decline at a much slower rate.

<span style="font-family: 'Comic Sans MS', sans-serif;">Source :<a href="http://lifehacker.com/top-10-reasons-to-exercise-regularly-besides-losing-we-1473616982">lifehacker</a></span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[9-best-reasons-work]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="category" nicename="uncategorized"><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[mvp_post_template]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[mvp_featured_image]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[hide]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_primary_category]]></wp:meta_key>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_focuskeywords]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[]]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[232]]></wp:meta_value>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>5 WORKOUTS FOR BIGGER ,STRONGER CALVES</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/5-moves-bigger-stronger-calves/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 08 Nov 2016 16:31:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=237</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">[stag_dropcap font_size="50px" style="squared"]C[/stag_dropcap]alves seem to be the most overlooked body part in the lower body. The muscle groups of your upper legs may very well support the core muscles of your body when you’re lifting but the lower leg muscles of the calves must work hard to stabilize the body through every movement while bearing the total weight of the body and any additional loads – twisting, raising you up onto your toes, lowering your onto your heels, twisting your feet.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="size-full wp-image-242 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/klkl.jpg" alt="klkl" width="422" height="616" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Start working through these top 5 exercises for increasing your calf muscles to ensure that you establish and maintain a well-rounded workout.
<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="wp-image-240 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/maxresdefault.jpg" alt="maxresdefault" width="453" height="254" /> Standing Calf Raises</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">This exercise can be done using either a dedicated machine or a calf block. The number of reps you do for this exercise will vary depending on your current calf mass and workout routine. Test different ranges to see which works for the density of your calf muscles.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Position yourself on a standing calf raise machine. Space your feet a bit closer then shoulder width apart. Keep your knees straight. Stand up on your tippy toes and hold this position for a second to enhance the peak contraction in the calfs, then lower your heels as far down as you can getting a good stretch throughout the calfs.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-238 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/296_1.jpg" alt="296_1" width="342" height="342" />Donkey calf raises.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> To do this exercise, you will need a bench or some other sturdy object and a partner--but no equipment is required. Bend over and grasp the sturdy object or bench with your hands. Your toes should be facing forward, and be sure not to lock your knees<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> Leg Press Calf Raise</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Another option for targeting the gastrocnemius is to perform your calf raises on a leg press machine.Sit on the leg press machine and hold the sled in place using only the balls of your feet and your toes. Keep your hips and knees stationary and produce all of the movement through your ankles only.The same basic technique should be applied here as well: a slow 3-4 second negative, controlled positive, full range of motion and pressing the sled using your big toe to maximize gastrocnemius activation.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <img class=" wp-image-239 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/box-jumps-ss_0.jpg" alt="box-jumps-ss_0" width="475" height="324" />Box Jumps</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">In many lifting exercises you need to have explosive strength in your legs. The box jump offers that, as it’s a functional exercise made to give your calf muscles far more power and “spring”. This exercise can train your muscles to react and contract much more quickly, and will deliver some serious tone to your calf muscles.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Stand on the balls of your feet and you toes in front of a box, with the height appropriate to your limitations. Jump onto the box and land again on your toes and the balls of your feet. Jump back down to the floor and repeat for 8 to 10 reps. Do not use dumbbells or other held weights during this exercise as you may need your hands free in order to catch yourself if you trip.<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-241 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/PageFiles.134492.Cybex20Leg20Press_LARGE.jpg" alt="pagefiles-134492-cybex20leg20press_large" width="612" height="515" />Leg Press Calf Raise</span></h3>
&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Sit in a leg press machine with your toes on the bottom of the foot plate and your heels hanging off the bottom edge. Press the weight sled up with your feet until your knees straight. Press up with your toes and the balls of your feet, pushing the sled up a few inches. Feel your calf muscles contract, then lower your toes back down, getting a good stretch in the calfs.</span>

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>237</wp:post_id>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>7 YOGA POSES TO CORRECT YOUR POSTURE</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/7-yoga-poses-correct-posture/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 10 Nov 2016 16:30:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=249</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Yoga helps you to relax and exercise at the same time. You will learn to find inner peace and simultaneously find yourself strengthening and conditioning your muscles. You will learn to breathe properly and alleviate chronic pain, eye problems, and even headaches.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-1854 aligncenter" src="http://pranayoga.co.in/asana/wp-content/uploads/posture-chart-final-Copy.png" sizes="(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px" srcset="http://pranayoga.co.in/asana/wp-content/uploads/posture-chart-final-Copy.png 1200w, http://pranayoga.co.in/asana/wp-content/uploads/posture-chart-final-Copy-100x52.png 100w, http://pranayoga.co.in/asana/wp-content/uploads/posture-chart-final-Copy-300x157.png 300w, http://pranayoga.co.in/asana/wp-content/uploads/posture-chart-final-Copy-1024x535.png 1024w" alt="posture chart" width="600" /></span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">We have compiled 7 poses  to help you to correct your posture and help you to keep your spine healthy.<img class="size-full wp-image-257 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/DS3W.jpg" alt="ds3w" width="308" height="600" />
</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">
1.Upward Facing Dog</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">From forward fold, move into your Chaturanga (high push-up to low push-up) with your exhale. As you<img class="wp-image-250 alignright" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/download.jpg" alt="download" width="238" height="150" /> breathe in, press your palms and the tops of your feet flat onto the ground. Lift your chest and your stomach up and forward; squeeze the tips of your shoulder blades into the center of your back. Engage your quadricipes as they lift off the ground. Your mid and lower back will thank you for this one!</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="wp-image-97 alignleft" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/Hover.jpg" alt="hover" width="184" height="148" /></span>
<h3></h3>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">2. Boat Pose</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Boat Pose is done by balancing your entire body on your buttocks so that you resemble a boat on water. This helps improve the flow of blood into the abdominals and the spine, which helps in the proper alignment and balance of the spine.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">This pose burns up fat in the waist, strengthening the mid-part of your body and improving digestion and other health problems concerning the thyroid, kidney, prostate, and intestines.<a href="https://www.yogaoutlet.com/guides/how-to-do-boat-pose-in-yoga">Details</a> Steps<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="wp-image-252 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Plank-pose-Santolanasana.jpg" alt="plank-pose-santolanasana" width="364" height="241" />3.Plank Pose</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">From table top pose, tuck your toes under and move your feet backward so that your legs are straight out behind you. Check that your wrists are underneath your shoulders, that your shoulders are away from your ears, and your body is in one straight line. Hold for 1 minute.</span>

&nbsp;
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-251 alignleft" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Camel-Pose-320x200.jpg" alt="camel-pose-320x200" width="221" height="138" />4. Camel Pose </span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Camel Pose is a helpful position especially for corporate workers who spend the whole day sitting on a chair. By stretching the back, it helps to increase the spine’s flexibility and elasticity.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Begin the pose in a sitting position on your knees. Reach to your back and grab your ankles with your hands. Breathe in as you raise your hips, then arch your back as you push your abdomen forward. Push your head back, completely freeing your chest.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Stay in the pose for as long as 20 seconds. To end Camel Pose, place your hands on your lower back and then enter Child’s Pose.<!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="wp-image-253 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/cowfacepose.jpg" alt="cowfacepose" width="337" height="340" />5.  Cow Face Posture:</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">It removes the stiffness from the neck, back and the shoulders, stretching the hips. </span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">If you are not able to reach your hands at the back then you can use a strap and </span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">hold the strap with the hands at the back as close as possible. Stay in the posture</span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">for 30 seconds breathing normally. Repeat on the other side.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">6. Standing Forward Bend</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Improve your posture with Uttanasana where you bend forward with your hands interlaced behind the back, and your shoulders are scrunched to the ears. As you let the shoulders slide when you pull your arms back, breathe out. This pose helps stretch your hamstrings and opens the shoulders.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="wp-image-254 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Universal-Spinal-twist-Shava-Udarakarshanasana-e1424898644279.jpg" alt="universal-spinal-twist-shava-udarakarshanasana-e1424898644279" width="469" height="187" />7.Universal spinal twist</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Start lying on your back in  corpse posture.Exhale, bend your right knee and place the right sole on the left thigh, keeping the left leg extended.</span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Inhale bring your left hand onto right knee, and spread your right arm out perpendicular to your body, palm facing down.Exhale and bring the right knee towards the floor on the left side of the body. Making sure to keep your shoulders on the floor.Turn the head and look to the right hand.Breathe deeply, relaxing into the posture, focusing on sinking your shoulders into the floor. Allow yourself to stay here for some time .To exit the posture, inhale lift the right leg up.Exhale extend and bring your arms to your sides ,Repeat with the opposite leg.</span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<category domain="category" nicename="yoga"><![CDATA[yoga]]></category>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[11-yoga-poses-correct-posture]]></wp:meta_value>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>9 Ways to Lose Belly Fat and Sculpt Your Abs</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/9-ways-lose-belly-fat-sculpt-abs/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 18 Nov 2016 16:02:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=270</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Looking for ways to lose belly fat and sculpt your abs without exhausting workouts and special equipment? Although an abdominal equipment can help you tone your abs faster, most of this equipment can be absolutely useless and it doesn’t bring the promised results. To get perfectly sculpted abs, you need a clean diet, lots of energy and the will to exercise each day. Consider using these 7 tips to lose belly fat and sculpt your abs. They do work</span></p>
<p class="article-section top-article-section"><img class=" wp-image-278 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/1x1.jpg" alt="1x1" width="434" height="635" /></p>

<h3 class="article-section top-article-section">Try the Roll-Up.</h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Hold a resistance band taut between your hands and lie on the floor face up, with legs extended and arms overhead. Pull abs in, tuck your chin, lift arms toward the ceiling, and roll head, shoulders, and torso up and over your legs as far as you can. Keep heels firmly on the floor and reach hands towards your feet. Pause, then slowly roll back down. Do 5 to 8 reps with 30 minutes of cardio 5 to 6 times a week. <!--nextpage--></span></div>
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section"></h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section">
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Talk and walk.</span></h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> I</span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">nstead of catching up with friends over food and drinks, suggest a reunion on the move—you're likely to work out 104% harder if you have an exercise buddy. Suggest a weekly walk-and-talk session, form a friendly fitness club, or try a new class at the gym together.</span></div>
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section">Clean your house.</h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"> <span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">One more reason to go after those dust bunnies: Vacuuming is a great ab workout. Tighten your abdominal muscles while you push back and forth for a tighter tummy while you clean. </span></div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section">
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section">Make time for cardio.</h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section">If you want to burn the most belly fat, a Duke University study confirms that aerobic exercise is the most effective in burning that deep, visceral belly fat. In fact, aerobic training burns 67% more calories than resistance training or a combination of the two, according to the study.</div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"></div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"></div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section">

<img class=" wp-image-271 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/woman-drinking-water-6-ways-boost-your-metabolism.jpg" alt="woman-drinking-water-6-ways-boost-your-metabolism" width="587" height="480" />

</div>
</div>
</div>
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Eat more fiber.</span></h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">For every 10 grams of fiber you eat daily, your belly will carry almost 4% less fat. Thankfully, there are more enjoyable ways to increase your fiber than scarfing down a box of bran flakes: Two apples, ½ cup of pinto beans, one artichoke, or two cups of broccoli will all give you 10 grams of belly-flattening fiber.</span></div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></div>
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Be pushy at restaurants.</span></h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Saying, "I'll go last" when the waiter comes around could be adding bulk to your belly. A recent study showed that a normal-weight woman was more likely to mimic a thin woman's eating habits than an obese woman's. So when you're out for girl’s night, order first. You'll keep yourself, and maybe even a friend or two, on track to a flatter tummy. <!--nextpage--></span></div>
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Do the Windshield Wiper.</span></h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Lie face up with arms out to your sides, palms down, and legs bent at 90 degrees so feet are off the floor. Keep abs tight and slowly lower legs to the left as far as possible, keeping shoulders on the floor. Pause, then return to start. Repeat to the right. Do 20 reps, alternating sides.</span></div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"></div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-272 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Avoid-late-night-snacking.jpg" alt="avoid-late-night-snacking" width="556" height="370" /></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Avoid late night snacking</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Staying up late to browse the Internet or watch your favorite show can make you reach for unhealthy snacks. Even if you eat healthy snacks late at night, it can still increase your waistline. Go to bed earlier to avoid late night snacking and to lose belly fat. Late night snacking can ruin your diet and can even disturb your sleep throughout the night.</span>

</div>
<h3 class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Fry fat with The Boat Move.</span></h3>
<div class="article-section top-article-section">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Target your deepest ab muscles with The Boat: Lie face up on a mat with arms straight up over chest. Lift your upper body off the ground by rolling through the spine. At the same time, raise your legs so that you're balancing on your butt, knees bent and shins parallel to the ground. Slowly roll back down onto the mat, lowering legs. That's 1 rep. Do 5 reps per set, resting 30 to 60 seconds between sets.</span>
<div class="sharebar-wrapper"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></div>
</div>
<div class="article-section top-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Source:<a href="http://www.prevention.com">prevention</a></span></div>
<div class="article-section bottom-article-section"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<category domain="category" nicename="workout"><![CDATA[workout]]></category>

		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thumbnail_id]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[272]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[mvp_featured_image]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[hide]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[mvp_post_template]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_content_score]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[90]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_focuskeywords]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[]]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_primary_category]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[8]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Ten Foods  That Help You  Lose Weight</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/10-best-foods-weight-loss/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 02 Dec 2016 15:18:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=283</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[If you dislike dieting, like most of us, and do not have time to go to the gym every other day, a few selected food choices could help move your scale in the right direction and would hardly have to break sweat.

<img class="size-full wp-image-298 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/31_5.jpg" alt="31_5" width="422" height="640" />

Certain foods can help you slim down or help you maintain a healthy weight while simultaneously packing your body with nutrients that aid in lowering cholesterol and blood pressure, preventing heart disease, and controlling type 2 diabetes.
<h3></h3>
<h3></h3>
<h3>Grapefruit</h3>
Even if you changed nothing else about your diet, eating half a grapefruit before each meal may help you lose up to a pound a week!A compound in the tangy fruit can lower insulin, a fat-storage hormone, and that can lead to weight loss. It's also a good source of protein, and because it's at least 90% water, it can fill you up so you eat less.

<!--nextpage-->
<h3><img class=" wp-image-295 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/cacao-hessian.jpg" alt="cacao-hessian" width="679" height="432" /></h3>
<h3>Raw Cacao</h3>
Raw Cacao, the unprocessed chocolate bean, is considered by David Wolfe and many other healthy food experts as the healthiest food in the world.It has the highest concentration of antioxidants of any food known to man. As basis for comparison, it has 20 times more antioxidants than dark chocolate, and about 15 times more than green tea and red wine. It also has the highest concentration of several key nutrients, including iron and magnesium. It possesses strong appetite-suppressant properties which means it a great part of a weight-loss program.
<h3><img class="wp-image-288 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/blueberries.jpg" alt="blueberries" width="625" height="355" /></h3>
<h3>Blueberries</h3>
Blueberry, a powerful figure friendly superfood, should also be included in your diet. These small berries contain powerful antioxidants, which neutralize free radicals.They also contain ample amounts of soluble fiber and water that produce a feeling of fullness so that you will stay satisfied for a longer duration between meals while improving digestion.The manganese in it metabolizes proteins, carbohydrates, and fats. In addition, blueberries are free from fat, cholesterol, or sodium.<!--nextpage-->
<h3>Broccoli</h3>
Cooked or raw, this cruciferous veggie is well-known for its cancer-preventing powers, but with a punch of filling fiber in less than 30 calories a serving, it's bound to prevent weight problems too.Brown rice is a heartier, fiber-packed alternative to less-than-super white rice. A half-cup serving contains 1.7 grams of Resistant Starch, a healthy carb that boosts metabolism and burns fat.
<h3>Pears</h3>
Just one pear packs 15% of your daily recommended amount of fiber. One study found that women who ate three pears a day consumed fewer calories and lost more weight than those who didn't. Ditch the peeler though; the skin is where all that filling fiber is hiding!
<h3><img class=" wp-image-292 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/bb-1.jpg" alt="bb" width="932" height="529" />
Black beans</h3>
Each tiny bean is packed with nutrients, including protein and fibre, while remaining low in calories and full of slow-release energy. This means you’ll feel fuller, while the high protein content will help firm up your muscles and keep you toned. Swap out burgers for burritos, and beef chilli for bean chilli.
<h3></h3>
<h3>Kale</h3>
With only 35 calories per serving, Kale is indeed the “King of the vegetable kingdom” and one of the best diet foods to lose weight. It is rich in many vitamins and minerals including Vitamin B6, Calcium, Magnesium and Lutein. It can deliver nearly 206% of the recommended daily vitamin A. It also is rich in vitamin K which helps build strong bones and teeth. The British Medical Journal has reviewed different studies which have proven that increasing the uptake of Kale can significantly reduce risk of Type 2 diabetes and also boost metabolism. Kale can be consumed raw, in the form of salads, or sauteed with some garlic and coconut oil for its weight loss benefits.
<h3>Green tea</h3>
Addicted to your builder’s brew? It may be time for a change. Swapping to green tea has been found to assist the body in flushing out excess fluids, helping to calm bloating around the stomach caused by water retention. What’s more, it has been found to speed up the metabolism, which can aid the burning of excess fat in the body.

<strong>Flax Seeds:</strong> Add just 1 tablespoon of flax seeds to your diet a day to give your body much-needed fiber and omega-3 fats that will help kill cravings and promote a general sense of well-being.They’re especially important if you’re a sun worshiper, with researchers observing in lab tests that they reduced melanoma tumors in mice by 63%

<strong>Watermelons:</strong>

This traditional picnic snack is high in vitamins A and C, as well as an incredibly beneficial antioxidant known as Lycopene, a cancer fighting agent which may also help promote weight loss.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="health"><![CDATA[health]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="health"><![CDATA[Health]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="tips"><![CDATA[tips]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[hide]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[mvp_post_template]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_content_score]]></wp:meta_key>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Nine Tricks to Make Your Eyes Look Brighter</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/nine-tricks-make-eyes-look-brighter/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 23 Dec 2016 18:53:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=304</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-305 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Curling-Lashes-1.jpg" alt="curling-lashes-1" width="622" height="773" /></span>
<h3></h3>
&nbsp;
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Apply a dot of highlighter in the corner of your eyes.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">The shadows in the corners of your eyes (right by the bridge of your nose) are the most visible. Apply a small dot of highlighter to help counteract these deep shadows. It will help reflect light and make your eyes appear wider and brighter.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Apply nude eyeliner in your waterline.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Nude or white liner is one of the best ways to combat red, bloodshot eyes, especially if you apply it directly to your waterline. The neutral color will help the whites of your eyes appear even whiter and diminish any redness.</span>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Product Recommendation: Urban Decay 24/7 Waterline Eye Pencil in Walk of Shame</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Curl your eyelashes.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Flat lashes will make your eyes look smaller, and, in contrast, curled lashes will make them appear larger. So, before you even reach for the mascara, make sure you’ve used an eyelash curler first.<!--nextpage--></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Curling-Lashes-1.jpg"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-9675 size-full tie-appear" src="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Curling-Lashes-1.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 1000px) 100vw, 1000px" srcset="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Curling-Lashes-1.jpg 1000w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Curling-Lashes-1-300x200.jpg 300w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Curling-Lashes-1-768x512.jpg 768w" alt="Curling-Lashes" width="1000" height="667" data-jpibfi-post-url="http://trend2wear.com/9-makeup-tips-tricks-make-eyes-look-brighter/" data-jpibfi-post-title="9 Makeup Tips and Tricks to Make Your Eyes Look Brighter" data-jpibfi-indexer="1" /></a></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Shape and fill in your brows.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Whether you prefer waxing, threading or tweezing, make sure your brows have a defined shape. This helps frame and open your eyes. If you have naturally sparse brows use a pencil to fill in any thin spots.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Experiment with shades of blue.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Blue is one of the best shades for achieving brighter-looking eyes as it counteracts dull, yellow hues and makes the whites of your eyes really stand out. If you don’t want to wear blue shadow, you can always try a little blue eyeliner instead for the same effect.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Line your eyes in a cat eye shape.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">A cat eye helps open your eyes and makes you look more awake. Even if you don’t want to do a dramatic winged look, you can still throw in a small outward flick at the end to help widen those peepers.</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/1432375667_123.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-9674 tie-appear" src="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/1432375667_123.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" srcset="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/1432375667_123.jpg 1600w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/1432375667_123-300x200.jpg 300w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/1432375667_123-768x511.jpg 768w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/1432375667_123-1024x682.jpg 1024w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/1432375667_123-310x205.jpg 310w" alt="1432375667_123" width="1600" height="1065" data-jpibfi-post-url="http://trend2wear.com/9-makeup-tips-tricks-make-eyes-look-brighter/" data-jpibfi-post-title="9 Makeup Tips and Tricks to Make Your Eyes Look Brighter" /></a></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Apply under eye concealer in a triangle shape</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Erase dark circles by using an under eye concealer every morning. Instead of applying product in a curved shape just under the eye, make a triangle or V-shape and blend it outward. This helps create a lifted appearance and makes your eyes look super awake.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Go for a neutral lip color.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">We know, we know. This isn’t your typical eye makeup trick, but hear us out. When drawing attention to the eyes, opt for a soft, neutral shade on your lips. This will help focus the attention upward and make your overall look feel soft and fresh.</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/mirco-pigmentation.png"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-9671 tie-appear" src="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/mirco-pigmentation.png" sizes="(max-width: 1000px) 100vw, 1000px" srcset="http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/mirco-pigmentation.png 1000w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/mirco-pigmentation-300x188.png 300w, http://trend2wear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/mirco-pigmentation-768x480.png 768w" alt="mirco-pigmentation" width="1000" height="625" data-jpibfi-post-url="http://trend2wear.com/9-makeup-tips-tricks-make-eyes-look-brighter/" data-jpibfi-post-title="9 Makeup Tips and Tricks to Make Your Eyes Look Brighter" data-jpibfi-indexer="5" /></a></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Protect your eyes from the sun</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">It’s just as important to protect your eyes from the sun’s harmful rays as it is your skin! Always bring your sunglasses with you (even on overcast days) to help keep your eyes bright and healthy.</span>

&nbsp;
<pre><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Courtesy <a href="http://trend2wear.com">trend2wear</a></span></pre>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
