	<item>
		<title>20 Balayage Hairstyle-Balayage Hair Color Ideas</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/20-balayage-hairstyle-balayage-hair-color-ideas/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 25 Dec 2016 14:56:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=309</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Chocolate Brown Balayage</span></h3>
<figure class="post-image"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a class="gallery" href="http://www.diys.com/balayage-hairstyles/dark-red-brown-black-balayage-hairstyle/"><img class="size-full wp-image-20889 aligncenter" src="http://cdn.diys.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/dark-red-brown-black-balayage-hairstyle.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 564px) 100vw, 564px" srcset="http://cdn.diys.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/dark-red-brown-black-balayage-hairstyle.jpg 564w, http://cdn.diys.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/dark-red-brown-black-balayage-hairstyle-230x230.jpg 230w, http://cdn.diys.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/dark-red-brown-black-balayage-hairstyle-300x300.jpg 300w" alt="Dark red brown black balayage hairstyle" width="564" height="564" /></a></span></figure><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">This incredible style has a deep, luscious variety of browns and reds painted into hair that is almost black naturally. And this proves that healthy, shiny hair helps to show off the balayage style. This example was found over on <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/-MkthDTGOQ/?taken-by=ashleymichelleartistry">Ashley Michelle Artistry’s Instagram account</a>.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Balayage ombre hair for</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> s</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">hort</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> hair</span></span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-71959" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/balayage-ombre-short-hair.jpg" alt="balayage-ombre-short-hair" width="518" height="778" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Now is the ideal time for a fresh new look and the sun-kissed blend of colors that come with balayage will be perfect for the sunshine season.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Brown and Blonde Ombre Balayage Hairstyle for Long Hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">This long wavy style is the perfect blend of balayage and classic ombre. No two colors go better together than<em> chocolate brown and golden blonde</em>, so every girl can rest assured that this style will look amazing on her.</span>
<div id="attachment_68222" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 497px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68222" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Balayage-Highlights-for-Wavy-Hair.jpg" alt="Balayage Highlights for Wavy Hair" width="487" height="705" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/9ogBOpB1qa/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Choppy Graduated Bob – balayage bob haircut for medium hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">The graduated bob is a classic cut that will never go out of style. This jagged cut adds a rock chick edge to the style and we love the soft touches of honey colored balayage.</span>
<div id="attachment_68252" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 467px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68252" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Honey-kissed-Hair.jpg" alt="Honey-kissed Hair" width="457" height="550" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/8USdfpSls0/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Choppy Balayage Bob for Short Hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Your balayage bob doesn’t have to have an A-line cut to look cool and edgy. This chic crop looks particularly flattering with sun-kissed flashes of caramel blonde.</span>
<div id="attachment_68242" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 485px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68242" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Brown-and-Blonde-Hair.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px" srcset="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Brown-and-Blonde-Hair.jpg 500w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Brown-and-Blonde-Hair-200x200.jpg 200w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Brown-and-Blonde-Hair-120x120.jpg 120w" alt="Brown and Blonde Hair" width="475" height="475" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/4BCfJpvaPw/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Long Flowing Locks – Balayage for Long Hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Luxurious long waves can sometimes be in danger of looking dull if they are all one shade of brown. Adding some super subtle balayage to your mermaid-like tresses can brighten them up and give your look a brand new lease of life.</span>
<div id="attachment_68232" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 487px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68232" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Black-and-Chestnut-Hair.jpg" alt="Black and Chestnut Hair" width="477" height="641" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/5oLWVOGDL2/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Centre Parted Beach Waves – Blonde Balayage Hairstyle for Girls</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Another amazing way to style long flowing hair is to put it into a side parting with some ‘fresh off the beach’ waves. This style can make any girl look surfer chic, especially with some golden highlighting balayage.</span>
<div id="attachment_68224" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 492px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68224" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Ultra-long-Waves.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px" srcset="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Ultra-long-Waves.jpg 500w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Ultra-long-Waves-200x200.jpg 200w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Ultra-long-Waves-120x120.jpg 120w" alt="Ultra-long Waves" width="482" height="482" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/7hHfhWHCnU/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Back view of Balayage Hairstyle – Balayage Highlights – Chestnut Curls</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">If your hair is a medium length, give it an extra bit of character and definition by opting for multi-tonal brown ombre. Cute curls make the chestnut and chocolate brown streaks stand out even more.</span>
<div id="attachment_68236" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 492px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68236" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Chocolate-Highlights.jpg" alt="Chocolate Highlights" width="482" height="632" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/5IKZoywJEl/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Extreme Graduated Bob – Balayage For Chic Length Hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Can’t decide whether you want to hack off your long hair in order to get a rock a cool, edgy bob? This extremely contrasting A-line bob is the perfect mix between the two lengths. The style is accentuated by soft shades of brown balayage.</span>
<div id="attachment_68244" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 457px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68244" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Deep-Brown-Curls.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px" srcset="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Deep-Brown-Curls.jpg 500w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Deep-Brown-Curls-200x200.jpg 200w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Deep-Brown-Curls-120x120.jpg 120w" alt="Deep Brown Curls" width="447" height="447" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/pbyC46EiGl/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Celebrity Waves – Balayage Hairstyle for Shoulder Length Hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><strong>Blonde Balayage Hairstyle</strong>: This golden balayage hairstyle with sleek waves looks totally red carpet ready. Try this look for your next big night out and you’re guaranteed to turn plenty of heads.</span>
<div id="attachment_68260" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 476px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68260" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Mid-length-Waves-with-Center-Part.jpg" alt="Mid-length Waves with Center Part" width="466" height="531" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/8_-VCISe_k/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Contrasting Curls – Most Popular Balayage Hair Color Idea</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">The juxtaposition between dark and blonde here is a little more dramatic than some other types of balayage. If you would prefer a bolder look, these glossy curls will look great on you.</span>
<div id="attachment_68256" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 487px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68256" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Two-Tone-Hair.jpg" alt="Two Tone Hair" width="477" height="712" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/9AQZFPj5JF/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Subtle Blonde Highlights – Balayage for Medium Hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">It’s no secret that rich brown shades can make hair look glossy and full of life. However, a few understated hints of blonde balayage can make even the healthiest head of hair look in better condition than ever.</span>
<div id="attachment_68248" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 489px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68248" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Sliver-Highlights-for-Brunette.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px" srcset="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Sliver-Highlights-for-Brunette.jpg 500w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Sliver-Highlights-for-Brunette-200x200.jpg 200w, http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Sliver-Highlights-for-Brunette-120x120.jpg 120w" alt="Sliver Highlights for Brunette" width="479" height="479" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BAgXMbLPaPR/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Balayage Hair Color Idea for Dramatic Lob</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><em>Balayage hair color ideas for 2017</em> – Lobs are literally all the rage right now, thanks to celebrities such as Kim Kardashian and Selena Gomez. This style is usually worn in a very neat, chic style but this jagged, super layered take on the lob looks youthful and fun.</span>
<div id="attachment_68240" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 489px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68240" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Blonde-Hair-Ends.jpg" alt="Blonde Hair Ends" width="479" height="599" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/8jlaFCqrxQ/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Mousey Brown – Back view of Simple easy Balayage Hairstyle</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Balayage can be used to lift a usually dull color, such as mousey brown. These ever-so-subtle dashes of blonde look almost natural and add just a little bit of extra sunshine to the style.</span>
<div id="attachment_68234" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 475px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68234" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Brown-and-Golden-Hair.jpg" alt="Brown and Golden Hair" width="465" height="581" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/8_tno_wJNy/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Balayage Hairstyle for Long Hair: Light Brown</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">If you really want to add a new lease of life to your mousey brown locks, dare to go just that little bit bolder with a shimmering shade of golden blonde. The choppy layers at the very end of the hair make this sun-kissed balayage stand out even more.</span>
<div id="attachment_68225" class="wp-caption aligncenter"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="size-full wp-image-68225 aligncenter" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Ombre-Straight-Hair-1.jpg" alt="Ombre Straight Hair" width="500" height="703" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/84zp1sAuz_/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Balayage Hairstyle for Wavy Hair – Black and Gold</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Balayage hairstyles 2017 – Girls with brown or blonde locks are able to experiment with a range of balayage shades which match perfectly with their own natural color. But what if your hair is jet black and you don’t feel like dying the entire thing? It’s easy. Stand out with a bold shade of gold which looks gorgeous on a black backdrop, especially with these long mermaid waves.</span>
<div id="attachment_68228" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 467px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68228" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Black-and-Brown-Hair.jpg" alt="Black and Brown Hair" width="457" height="471" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/pDKPU_lU-j/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Long and Layered</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">If you’re worried about your long hair looking lank or heavy, break up those flowing ends with plenty of layers and a hint of chestnut balayage.</span>
<div id="attachment_68238" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 480px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68238" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Straight-Hair-with-Blonde-Highlights.jpg" alt="Straight Hair with Blonde Highlights" width="470" height="588" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/70hFMSn5HH/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Layered Lob – Balayage Hairstyle for Medium Hair</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Here is another gorgeous way you can rock a layered long bob. Texture and dimension are added to this lob thanks to the messy curls and contrasting blonde balayage.</span>
<div id="attachment_68258" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 472px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68258" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Messy-Balayage-Long-Bob.jpg" alt="Messy Balayage Long Bob" width="462" height="538" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/9NDhDvyzw2/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Two-Tone Brunette – Balayage Hairstyle with Waves</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Dark haired girls really know how to make balayage their own. As if these luxuriously long sweeping curls weren’t beautiful enough on their own, the subtle brown balayage really adds an extra hint of character.</span>
<div id="attachment_68223" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 457px;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class=" wp-image-68223" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Voluminous-Waves-1.jpg" alt="Voluminous Waves" width="447" height="614" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://instagram.com/p/81hE0WD5Hp/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Credit</a></span></p>

</div>
<h3></h3>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>5 Quick Hair Style Tutorials  For Party season</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/5-quick-hair-style-tutorials-party-season/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 28 Dec 2016 17:28:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=315</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div id="post_element_239896" class="post-element post-element-heading">
<h2></h2>
<h3></h3>
<h3>Hair Style Ideas Party season</h3>
From the end of the year to the end of the year, the scene of calls will increase somewhat. Even on a casual invited day, arranging is a girl's heart that wants to put on a spirit. However, it is difficult in reality to visit salons every time.

</div>
<div id="post_element_583958" class="post-element post-element-text"></div>
<div id="post_element_516907" class="post-element post-element-picture">
<div class="post-element-image-outer">

<img id="image-2079331" class="post-element-image-source aligncenter" src="https://cdn.locari.jp/web/images/p/post_element/picture/516907/w621_b670504a6220e.jpg" width="621" height="621" data-post-picture-id="89771" data-pictureid="516907" />
<div class="post-element-image-info clearfix">
<div class="post-element-source truncate">Source: <a class="post-outbound-link" href="http://locari.jp/posts/redirect/2079331" target="_blank" data-href="https://hair.cm/snap-215889/?utm_source=locari&amp;utm_medium=article&amp;utm_campaign=71874">Hair.Cm</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="post_element_257173" class="post-element post-element-heading-small"></div>
<h3 id="post_element_583961" class="post-element post-element-text">Braid Shinyon</h3>
<div class="post-element post-element-text"></div>
<div class="post-element post-element-text">A cute classic form here. It is a pleasing point that it is hard to collapse because I have fastened braided hair.</div>
<div class="post-element post-element-text"></div>
<div id="post_element_583962" class="post-element post-element-text"></div>
<div id="post_element_129425" class="post-element post-element-instagram">
<div class="post-element-instagram-image-outer">
<div class="post-element-border-outer">
<div class="post-element-image-outer"><img class="instagram-media alignnone" src="https://www.instagram.com/p/BKjoxScgU_p/media?size=l" alt="Media? Size = l" /></div>
<div class="post-element-image-outer"></div>
<div class="post-element-image-outer"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="post_element_583914" class="post-element post-element-text">
<ul>
 	<li>Divide by center.</li>
 	<li>5 Braid the left and right hair bundle and braid it.</li>
 	<li>7 Fix the left braid to the left.</li>
 	<li>In the same way on the right side.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<!--nextpage-->
<h3> 2 way arrangement</h3>

<div id="post_element_583946" class="post-element post-element-text">

It is OK 2 way arrangement with a ponytail or cignillon. If you want to make a ponytail, please go to the last step until you reach Step 5, if you want to go to Sinyon.

</div>
<div id="post_element_516893" class="post-element post-element-picture">
<div class="post-element-image-outer">

<img id="image-2079268" class="post-element-image-source aligncenter" src="https://cdn.locari.jp/web/images/p/post_element/picture/516893/w621_41c103f94f411.jpg" data-post-picture-id="89769" data-pictureid="516893" />
<div class="post-element-image-info clearfix">
<div class="post-element-source truncate">Source: <a class="post-outbound-link" href="http://locari.jp/posts/redirect/2079268" target="_blank" data-href="https://hair.cm/article-3287/?utm_source=locari&amp;utm_medium=article&amp;utm_campaign=71874">Hair.Cm</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="post_element_583942" class="post-element post-element-text">
<ul>
 	<li>Set the ponytail and unravel the back of the head.</li>
 	<li> Make a wave winding.</li>
 	<li> 6 Decorate the ribbon.</li>
 	<li> Connect hair ends.</li>
 	<li> Fixed inward by caught in pin.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<h3 id="post_element_257177" class="post-element post-element-heading-small">Side pony</h3>
<div id="post_element_583965" class="post-element post-element-text">

It's just an easy arrangement, just to tie it up. Hair accessories shine well because it is simple.

</div>
<div id="post_element_516887" class="post-element post-element-picture">
<div class="post-element-image-outer">

<img id="image-2079213" class="post-element-image-source aligncenter" src="https://cdn.locari.jp/web/images/p/post_element/picture/516887/w621_28129ff1fd587.jpg" data-post-picture-id="89767" data-pictureid="516887" />
<div class="post-element-image-info clearfix">
<div class="post-element-source truncate">Source: <a class="post-outbound-link" href="http://locari.jp/posts/redirect/2079213" target="_blank" data-href="https://hair.cm/article-3182/?utm_source=locari&amp;utm_medium=article&amp;utm_campaign=71874">Hair.Cm</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="post_element_583928" class="post-element post-element-text">

Connect to one at the left position.
Loose balance well, decorate hair accessories such as scarves and headband, and it is completed.
</div>
<!--nextpage-->


<div id="post_element_257181" class="post-element post-element-heading-small">
<h2>Boryumy pony</h2>
</div>
<div id="post_element_583909" class="post-element post-element-text">

It is an introduction of a ponytail arrangement with plenty of Boyeum. It would be nice if you wear straight hair, lightly before arranging.

</div>
<div id="post_element_129422" class="post-element post-element-instagram">
<div class="post-element-instagram-image-outer">
<div class="post-element-border-outer">
<div class="post-element-image-outer"><img class="instagram-media alignnone" src="https://www.instagram.com/p/BMif7q4FwEC/media?size=l" alt="Totorial" width="1080" height="1080" /></div>
<div class="post-element-instagram-desc"></div>
</div>
<div class="post-element-source"></div>
<ul>
 	<li class="post-element-source">Leave the side and make a ponytail.</li>
 	<li class="post-element-source">Loosen the top hair.</li>
 	<li class="post-element-source">Twist the hair on the right side twisted, wrapped around rubber and fixed.</li>
 	<li class="post-element-source"> Do the same for the left side.</li>
 	<li class="post-element-source"> It is completion.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<a href="https://hair.cm/p/25ej2o7xvj"><img class="aligncenter" src="https://d23ci79vtjegw9.cloudfront.net/photographs/zoom/c6/c699d984b73f.jpg" alt=" nalu hair" width="399" height="1280" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>20 New Year’s Eve Decorating Ideas</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/20-new-years-eve-decorating-ideas/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 30 Dec 2016 18:24:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=327</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">When the end of the year arrives, everyone is already starting to plan and wish good things for the upcoming year.</span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">To reinforce this request in the new cycle, one tip is to decorate your New Year's Eve party with what you most want for next year.</span>

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Love? Luck? Prosperity? Peace? All this, besides being super positive thoughts, can become a beautiful themed party full of good energies to receive the new year.</span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">For those who are short on time, it is also worth choosing a color that represents this year's wish to decorate your party.</span>
<pre><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="wp-image-170671 aligncenter" title="New Year's themed parties Peace, love, luck and prosperity" src="http://www.fashionbubbles.com/files/2012/12/1615_Gold__Silver_Champagne_New_Year_Ceiling_Decoration.jpg" alt="New Year's themed parties Peace, love, luck and prosperity" width="647" height="208" /></span>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <span style="font-size: 8pt;">Via: <a title="" href="http://www.buypartygoods.co.uk/images/products/1615_Gold_&amp;_Silver_Champagne_New_Year_Ceiling_Decoration.jpg" target="_blank" data-rel="lightbox-0">Party Goods</a></span></span></pre>
<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Check out some suggestions for New Year's Eve party decoration and happy new year!</strong></span>
<div id="attachment_43776" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 582px;">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-43776" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Stylish-Candle-Holders.jpg" alt="Stylish Candle Holders" width="572" height="397" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Stylish Candle Holders <a href="http://betterdecoratingbible.com/2012/12/26/how-to-new-year%E2%80%99s-party-prep-decor-ideas/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">via</a></span></p>

</div>
<div id="attachment_43777" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 597px;">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-43777" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Treat-Holders.jpg" alt="Treat Holders" width="587" height="391" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Treat Holders <a href="http://cuteandcompany.com/new-years-eve-party-ideas-inspiration/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">via</a></span></p>

</div>
<div id="attachment_43778" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 602px;">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-43778" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Decorative-Glasses.jpg" alt="Decorative Glasses" width="592" height="840" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Decorative Glasses <a href="http://cuteandcompany.com/new-years-eve-party-ideas-inspiration/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">via</a></span></p>

</div>
<div id="attachment_43779" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 588px;">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-43779" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Playful-Party-Decoration.jpg" alt="Playful Party Decoration" width="578" height="421" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Playful Party Decoration<a href="http://adworks.pk/fashion/new-concept-make-remarkable-new-year-eve-party.php" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"> via</a></span></p>

</div>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><!--nextpage--></p>

<div id="attachment_43779" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 588px;"></div>
<div id="attachment_43780" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 585px;">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-43780" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Purple-Table-Decoration.jpg" alt="Purple Table Decoration" width="575" height="408" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Purple Table Decoration <a href="http://www.lushome.com/colorful-christmas-table-decor-ideas-25-bright-holiday-table-decorations-centerpieces/93704" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">via</a></span></p>

</div>
<div id="attachment_43781" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 585px;">

<span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class=" wp-image-43781" src="http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Pretty-Party-Decorating-Idea.jpg" alt="Pretty Party Decorating Idea" width="575" height="451" /></span>
<p class="wp-caption-text"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Pretty Party Decorating Idea <a href="http://animatedlim.blogspot.com/2014/11/best-32-sparkling-diy-decoration-tips.html" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">via</a></span></p>

<div id="attachment_43782" class="wp-caption aligncenter"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> </span></div>

		<title>4 The Best Eye Makeup Tips and Tricks</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/4-best-eye-makeup-tips-tricks/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 31 Dec 2016 19:08:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=335</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h3>1 Black &amp; gold glamorous christmas makeup</h3>
<img class="size-full wp-image-336 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/ds.jpg" alt="ds" width="650" height="1085" />

Source : <a href="https://liz-breygel.blogspot.com.br/2016/12/black-gold-glamorous-christmas-makeup.html">breygel.com</a>

<img class=" wp-image-337 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/how-to-classic-lift.jpg" alt="how-to-classic-lift" width="546" height="993" /><!--nextpage-->

<img class=" wp-image-338 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/natural-eye-makeup-tutorial.jpg" alt="natural-eye-makeup-tutorial" width="554" height="1566" />

<img class=" wp-image-339 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Winged-Eyeliner-Trick.jpg" alt="winged-eyeliner-trick" width="556" height="1714" />

	<item>
		<title>Three Yoga Poses To Build Core Muscles</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/3-yoga-poses-to-build-core-muscles/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 07 Jan 2017 19:35:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=351</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-352" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/8_1.jpg" alt="" width="900" height="1724" />Below are some yoga poses which will help you develop the core strength you desire:</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">1. Standing </span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">A very effective kind of standing pose is the tree pose. Although it seems simple, it engages all the core muscles and helps maintain balance.</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Standing yoga postures require both strength and flexibility, and categorize most of the advanced asanas. Standing poses are generally held for shorter times than other poses, and tend to be more energetically uplifting and opening.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">2. Hovering cat</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">This is also very effective for strengthening the core muscles. Get down on your hands and knees—as a starting position—and extend your legs out behind, so that your toes are together and touching the floor. Then, proceed by lowering your arms so that you are resting on your forearms with your elbows bent directly under your shoulder, with your body extended and remain in this position for as long as you can. Do it repeatedly for effective results.</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">3. Knee to Arm Plank</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Come forward to Dolphin Plank; bring the right knee to the outer upper right arm, hugging the knee toward your midline. Pause. Lift the front body toward the back body, as you press back through your left heel. Hug the arms toward one another, keeping them straight and strong, as you reach through your crown. Take 5 deep breaths. Maintain integrity in your torso as you slowly return to Three-Legged Down Dog.</span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>351</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2017-01-07 19:35:48]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2017-01-07 19:35:48]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[3-yoga-poses-to-build-core-muscles]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

	<item>
		<title>6 EASY WAYS TO CREATE AWESOME HAIRSTYLE FOR LESS THAN 2 MINUTES</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/6-easy-ways-create-awesome-hairstyle-less-2-minutes/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 Jan 2017 16:21:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=357</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Fantastic modern hairstyles that can be made for just a few minutes today is our suggestion for you. We know that hair is very important to complete the modern look of an every girl. Sometimes hair tend to look very complicated, but essentially very simple. If you have long hair, you know how difficult it is sometimes to find time for keep it always to be neatly combed, washed and arranged. To save you from the painstaking maintenance of hair and making complicated hairstyles our team today for you have prepared these 14 simple and easy to make hairstyles that we hope you’ll love. Enjoy.</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="size-full wp-image-358 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/1.jpg" alt="" width="604" height="604" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span class="goog-text-highlight">Intricate wiring, feminine roll, intricately interwoven braids, perky "ponytail" - these beautiful and elegant hairstyles will not take much time. </span>Just a few minutes - and the head looks as if it worked on a few hours. Be sure to view the pictures, instructions for creating a "lightning" hairstyles.</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="size-full wp-image-359 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2.jpg" alt="" width="604" height="604" /></span>

<!--nextpage-->

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <img class="size-full wp-image-360 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/3.jpg" alt="" width="604" height="604" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <img class="size-full wp-image-361 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/5.jpg" alt="" width="604" height="604" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <img class="size-full wp-image-362 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/6.jpg" alt="" width="604" height="604" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> <img class="size-full wp-image-363 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/7.jpg" alt="" width="604" height="604" /></span>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Tricks  in Makeup That  Will  Change Your Life</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/tricks-makeup-will-change-life/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 20 Jan 2017 14:23:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=373</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2></h2>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-379 size-full" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2295c1450ed38cc2e797a46a4fe5edcf-1.jpg" alt="Sometimes beauty spend an hour on the guidance of beauty.Professional makeup artists do make-up is much faster and better.Any girl would have given much for to see what tricks they use." width="644" height="1297" />Quality makeup requires concentration and a lot of free time.</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Sometimes beauty spend an hour on the guidance of beauty.Professional makeup artists do make-up is much faster and better.Any girl would have given much for to see what tricks they use.</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">If you are one of them - read the material! It was here collected all the secrets of make-up! Your make-up routine in turn from fun ritual!</span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">1. Apply blush ... forever!</span></h3>
&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-13604 td-animation-stack-type0-1" src="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/690x463_0xd42ee42a_1549714001438962951.jpeg" sizes="(max-width: 690px) 100vw, 690px" srcset="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/690x463_0xd42ee42a_1549714001438962951.jpeg 690w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/690x463_0xd42ee42a_1549714001438962951-626x420.jpeg 626w" alt="" width="690" height="463" /></span>

&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">If you need to quickly refresh the face <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> using the minimum amount of money <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> the secret - for you! When you have only mascara and blush - is essentially all <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> what you need! When applying pink or peach blush on the apples of the cheeks <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> do not forget to brush to touch the eyelids and the area under the eyebrows - it will instantly make eyes open and relaxed. <strong>No shade you do not need it!</strong></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">2. Always soften the pencil with a lighter</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter size-medium wp-image-13605 td-animation-stack-type0-1" src="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/6-2-1-696x445.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 696px) 100vw, 696px" srcset="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/6-2-1-696x445.jpg 696w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/6-2-1-768x492.jpg 768w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/6-2-1-656x420.jpg 656w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/6-2-1.jpg 800w" alt="" width="696" height="445" /></span>

&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">This fast life hacking by professional make-up artists will come in handy to you no matter <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> how do you use a black pencil. <strong>Let Lighter forever dwell in your purse! </strong>First <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> than to make up eyes <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> Hold the pencil a few seconds an open flame - after this pen will be even softer and you can most beautifully and carefully shaded it in the haze. Profit!</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">3. Sponge + oil</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">           If you have dry skin <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> then applying tonal funds can be a problem. To forget about it <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> do not use a brush <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> a sponge buy. Before using wet it is not water <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> and blot with a special oil for the face. However <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> for this purpose come and coconut. <strong>"Oil" sponge will help you tone perfectly applied</strong> even on dry and peeling skin.</span>
<h2><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">4. Pumps concealer on the wings of the nose and nose</span></h2>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter size-medium wp-image-13606 td-animation-stack-type0-1" src="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/576246fd04f8c-696x325.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 696px) 100vw, 696px" srcset="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/576246fd04f8c-696x325.jpg 696w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/576246fd04f8c-768x358.jpg 768w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/576246fd04f8c-900x420.jpg 900w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/576246fd04f8c.jpg 1007w" alt="" width="696" height="325" /></span>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><strong>        </strong></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><strong>              When you maskiruesh bruises under the eyes with the help of corrector <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> do not forget about the other two problem areas</strong>  - there <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> where the end of the nose wings <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> and nose closer to the corners of the eyes. The skin in these areas are often different in color <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> but a small layfkah will allow you to quietly make your make-up a little better. By the way <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> all of the professional make-up artists are doing.</span>
<h2><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">5. Hairspray instead eyebrow wax</span></h2>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-13607 td-animation-stack-type0-1" src="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/87d7895ceab8191d30611de3d93653f6e2de_o.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 560px) 100vw, 560px" srcset="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/87d7895ceab8191d30611de3d93653f6e2de_o.jpg 560w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/87d7895ceab8191d30611de3d93653f6e2de_o-80x60.jpg 80w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/87d7895ceab8191d30611de3d93653f6e2de_o-265x198.jpg 265w" alt="" width="560" height="418" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">             To look perfect eyebrows and combed <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> it is not necessary to buy a special gel or wax. Just <strong>Establishments brush <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span></strong> which you'll be combing the hair. <strong>Sprinkle it with hairspray</strong> and quickly swipe the eyebrows <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> is a means of not dried up.</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><!--nextpage--></span>
<h2><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">6. Establishments two tonal means</span></h2>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter size-medium wp-image-13608 td-animation-stack-type0-1" src="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/063ee9aeb9f60efa02823e51450f82ce_XL-696x464.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 696px) 100vw, 696px" srcset="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/063ee9aeb9f60efa02823e51450f82ce_XL-696x464.jpg 696w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/063ee9aeb9f60efa02823e51450f82ce_XL-768x512.jpg 768w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/063ee9aeb9f60efa02823e51450f82ce_XL-630x420.jpg 630w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/063ee9aeb9f60efa02823e51450f82ce_XL.jpg 900w" alt="" width="696" height="464" /></span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">                </span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">                 This life hacking once shared in his blog, the famous Lisa Eldridge <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> creative director of makeup Lancome brand. The bottom line is <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> to use two tones means for a perfect make-up <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> be sure of the same hue. <strong>You need to have a dense tone <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span></strong> which is applied only on problem areas - for example <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> around the mouth <span class="oa_obracket_sp_b">(</span> skin in this area often requires correction) or in the area of redness. <strong>And the second tonal basis <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> </strong>lightweight fluid, or serum, - for the rest of the surface of the face <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> which does not require a major adjustment. This secret will allow your skin to look as much as possible of course!</span>

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><!--nextpage--></span>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">7. Quickly make a moisturizing lipstick matte</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><img class="aligncenter size-medium wp-image-13609 td-animation-stack-type0-1" src="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-696x522.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 696px) 100vw, 696px" srcset="https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-696x522.jpg 696w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-768x576.jpg 768w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-1024x768.jpg 1024w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-80x60.jpg 80w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-265x198.jpg 265w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-1068x801.jpg 1068w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1-560x420.jpg 560w, https://wom-paradise.ru/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/2016-08-15_23.19.47-1.jpg 1080w" alt="" width="696" height="522" /></span>

&nbsp;

<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">                    Matte lipstick in fashion <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> but <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> alas <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> even the quality of their dried lips ... There is a solution much more simple and pleasant. <strong>Use your usual moisturizing lipstick <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> applying blush on top of it! </strong>Fluffy brush. Powder for this purpose are not suitable <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> it is only <span class="oa_oqoute_sp_q">"</span> eats" color <span class="oa_comma_b">,</span> but the blush will look perfect - try.</span>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Three Ways to adjust the eyebrows: the new hot trend !</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/three-ways-adjust-eyebrows-new-hot-trend/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 23 Jan 2017 16:27:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=382</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="h3"><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">However, the technique has gone further and today offers us an original and fresh draw eyebrows! Incredibly, konturing copes with its task here. Eyebrow make-up artists always stood out in a separate chapter, so this innovation can be considered quite natural. Konturing eyebrows helps to change not only their shape, but also the volume. Do you want to learn it? Read the material!</span></div>
[toc]
<div class="h3"></div>
<div class="h3"> <img class="size-full wp-image-384 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/094276fb15ce4690640465f506604066.jpg" alt="" width="564" height="750" /></div>
<div class="soc_button sharing_buttom" data-img="http://static.makeup.ru/img/3832/4/9qsfVF3hUgmJSEmXu227iCDCtxAevN89.jpg" data-description="%D0%A1%D0%BA%D1%83%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BF%D1%82%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5+%D1%81%D0%BA%D1%83%D0%BB+%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B5+%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%BE+%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%BC+%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BC%2C+%D0%B0+%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%82+%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%82%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B3+%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B9+%E2%80%93+%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9+%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B4+%D1%81+%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C%D1%88%D0%B8%D0%BC+%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B4%D1%83%D1%89%D0%B8%D0%BC.+%D0%A0%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%BC%2C+%D1%87%D1%82%D0%BE+%D0%BA+%D1%87%D0%B5%D0%BC%D1%83" data-href="http://makeup.ru/article/trend-konturing-brovej" data-title="%D0%A2%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B4%3A+%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%82%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B3+%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B9"></div>
<div id="M348608ScriptRootC603490"></div>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-32 col-md-offset-8">
<div class="article_number_list">
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">1. "Stacking" eyebrows</span></h3>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="td-animation-stack-type1-1 td-animation-stack-type0-2 aligncenter wp-image-44784 size-full" src="http://krasotka.cc/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/hudozhestvennoe-oformlenie-brovej.jpg" alt="Three Ways to adjust the eyebrows: the new hot trend !" width="633" height="370" /></span></h3>
</div>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Without easy preparation is indispensable. Firstly, the need to ensure that the eyebrows are no residues of moisturizing cream, fluid tone and powder. Second, using a special brush eyebrows need to "comb" and "put" to their shape has acquired a neat appearance.<!--nextpage--></span>
<div class="article_number_list">
<h3></h3>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">2. Create a loop<img class="size-full wp-image-44786 td-animation-stack-type1-1 td-animation-stack-type0-2 aligncenter" src="http://krasotka.cc/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/karandash-dlya-brovey-5.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px" srcset="http://krasotka.cc/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/karandash-dlya-brovey-5.jpg 500w, http://krasotka.cc/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/karandash-dlya-brovey-5-80x60.jpg 80w" alt="" width="500" height="375" /></span></h3>
</div>
<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Directly to konturinga you need two shades of brow tools: the darker and lighter. It is best to use the powder, because it is easier to shade. After earning a bit of a dark powder beveled brush, draw a top and bottom border of eyebrows. Do not overdo it with the pressure, otherwise the result will receive "marker" his eyebrows, as if drawn by a stencil.</span>
<div class="ads_slot_3">
<div class="article_number_list">
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">3. Filling the circuit</span></h3>
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><img class="td-animation-stack-type1-1 td-animation-stack-type0-2 aligncenter wp-image-44782 size-full" src="http://krasotka.cc/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/02-5.jpg" alt="Three Ways to adjust the eyebrows: the new hot trend !" width="650" height="411" /></span></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>22 Emoji Nail Art Ideas</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/22-emoji-nail-art-ideas/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 29 Jan 2017 16:16:36 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Geneva;">Emoji nails are fun, trendy, cute and fashionable. Although the designs may seem challenging, they predominantly consist of one-stroke lines and dots, which makes this design easy to follow along with.</span>

&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-420 aligncenter" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/5a21a1b4fe47f98f59007ce57c6cb1b1.jpg" alt="" width="564" height="642" />

	<item>
		<title>Ten Trendy Hair Cuts for Women</title>
		<link>http://mesning.com/ten-trendy-hair-cuts-women/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 30 Jan 2017 16:40:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://mesning.com/?p=430</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Looking for a new haircut? Trendy-hairstyles-for-women.com offers you a large collection of women hair looks. Our website is a well organized catalog of women hair photos: you can search for women hairstyles by length of hair (short haircuts, medium length hairstyles and long hairstyles), by hair texture (straight, curly, wavy or afro hair), by hair style (pixie cuts, short or long bob hairstyles, undercut hairstyles, all down, braids, updos, half up half down, french twist, top buns, ponytails etc.) or by age group (e.g. hairstyles for mature women). Just take some time to immense yourself in our website and we hope you will find the perfect hair style for yourself.</span>

&nbsp;
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Silver Pixie Crop – Cute, Very Short Hair Cuts with Side Sweep Bangs</span></h3>
[caption id="attachment_431" align="aligncenter" width="564"]<img class="wp-image-431 size-full" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/30_.jpg" width="564" height="564" /> <span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BK_GgDlhnVl/">Credit</a></span>[/caption]
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Purple to Silver Bob with Sweeping Fringe – Shaved Short Haircut</span></h3>
[caption id="attachment_432" align="aligncenter" width="564"]<img class="wp-image-432 size-full" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/30_1.jpg" width="564" height="564" /> <span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="http://styl.fm/newsy/185192.stylowe-ciecie-long-pixie-wiosenna-metamorfoza-dla-kazdej-z-was?pid=305899">Credit</a></span>[/caption]
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Copped Wedged Crop – Short Hairstyle Ideas for Women</span></h3>
[caption id="attachment_433" align="aligncenter" width="500"]<img class="wp-image-433 size-full" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/30_2.jpg" width="500" height="689" /> <span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="https://www.pinterest.com/pin/364087951106986452/">Credit</a></span>[/caption]
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Curly Messy Bob with Blonde Highlights – Balayage, Messy Shoulder Length Hairstyles</span></h3>
[caption id="attachment_434" align="aligncenter" width="564"]<img class="wp-image-434 size-full" src="http://mesning.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/30_3.jpg" width="564" height="704" /> <span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="http://mrandmrs2015.tumblr.com/post/139476504311/i-dont-just-make-hair-longer-sometime-i-forget">Credit</a></span>[/caption]
<h3><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> Long, Highlighted Style with Loose Curls – Balayage Shoulder Length Haircut</span></h3>
